testcaseName: Dose #1 of Pfizer Covid-19 Vaccine (age 12 years)

generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient is administered the first dose of the Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine (at age 12 years), that the dose is valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange:
